Back in 2023, Kaspi.kz just won that Deloitte award for innovation.
HostB: Yeah, and Mikhail Lomtadze gave a really gracious acceptance on behalf of the whole team.
HostA: Right, he was thanking the customers too, which I always think is a nice touch.
HostB: Absolutely. And the survey itself, it was 75 CEOs from all these different sectors in Kazakhstan.

HostB: And consumer trust, which is huge. In this economy, trust is everything.
HostA: Deloitte’s been doing this study globally for what, like, 23 years?
HostB: Uh-huh, and in Kazakhstan specifically for the last nine. It’s all about how leaders see the economic landscape, risks, opportunities.
HostA: Makes sense. You can actually read the full thing on their website if you’re into that.
